a white World ;)

you assholes better take a look in your history books again and shut the fuck up. hitler didn't want a white world, he wanted a world full of german arians. in fact hitler would have killed all of you bastards. Fuckin nazi bastards

Actually what Hitler wanted was for the United States, Germany and Britain to be the 3 ruling superpowers of the world. He didnt want to be enemies with the United States or England but didnt have a choice. Hitler was a great man but he was also a terrible man as well as a coward a sadomasochist and cripple. Many people dont know who Hitler really was. His chosen career path was actually to be an artist but was turned down by the art school. He then went on to be the Fuhrer of the Third Reich instead.

he was an evil man who would have got rid of all the jews, gay people, disabled, anyone who was not white, and gypsyies, anyone who was imperfect or had an opinian not his own. still he is an interesting person, its a shame those german officers didnt manage to kill him on the first attempt
